tool_description: Shows an image of an address, using Google Street View.
name: Address to Image
title: Address to Image

api_list.name: getimage
api_list.description: Generates an image for a given address. Images are output in JPEG as a base64 encoded string.

optional_parameters.name: marker
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not to display a marker on the image at the desired address, 0 or 1

optional_parameters.name: zoom
optional_parameters.description: The level of image zoom. Default is 1, range is 0-5
